trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_000_000<tab>Welcome to Sinus Ardorum's cosmic fortune counter! Feeling lucky with your lunar credits?
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_000_001<tab>Welcome to Glassblowers' Beacon's cosmic fortune counter! Feeling lucky with your Phaenna credits?
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_000_010<tab>Wait... That signature sparkle! Could it be? <gasp> A Big Bang ticket!?
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_000_020<tab>You should thank your lucky stars, my friend, for that elusive ticket entitles you to a Big Bang fortune─the chance of a lifetime!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_010_000<tab>Draw a Big Bang fortune.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_010_010<tab>Draw a cosmic fortune. (<var 2B ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var>)) /var> required: <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var>)
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_010_020<tab>Learn more.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_010_030<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_010_040<tab>How can I help you?
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_020_000<tab>Here at the Moongate Hub, our member rewards program takes the form of a roulette game. Just spin the wheel and wish on a star for a fabulous prize!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_020_010<tab>What better way to spend your hard-earned <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var>? At <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> per ticket, we're practically giving them away!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_020_020<tab>Upon payment, you'll choose between two roulette wheels. Set your sights on the more tantalizing prize selection, then give it a whirl!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_020_030<tab>You can find all the details on your exotablet, if you're so inclined.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_030_000<tab>Wait a moment─you haven't collected your prize from your last fortune! Let's fix that...
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_030_010<tab>On second thought, I can't fit any prizes into a full pack. Come back after you've lightened your load.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_040_000<tab>Oh dear, I'm afraid you don't have enough <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var>. Come back and see me once you've earned a few more.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_040_010<tab>On second thought, I won't be able to fit any prizes into a full pack. Come back after you've lightened your load.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_050_000<tab>Remember: fortune is always a few credits away!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_050_001<tab>Oh dear, it looks like your bags are full. No need to rush sorting your things, though─I'll be ready and waiting when you're done!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_050_010<tab>My, what an explosive outcome! If you ever have more shiny tickets burning a black hole in your pocket, come and see me for another Big Bang!

TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_050_011<tab>Oh dear, it looks like your bags are full. I'm sure you're eager to try your luck with a Big Bang, but no need to rush. Sort through your things, and I'll be ready and waiting when you're done.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_060_000<tab>Welcome to the cosmic fortune counter! I hate to tell you this, but our lottery system is under maintenance at the moment. I hope you'll check back later!
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_070_000<tab>Pay <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8040302 /var> for a cosmic fortune? (Credits remaining: <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var>)
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_070_010<tab>Trade <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8030202 /var> for a Big Bang fortune? (Tickets remaining: <var 20 E802 /var>)
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_070_020<tab>Yes.
TEXT_CTSWKSLOT_00918_ORBITINGWAY_070_030<tab>No.
